body_html:
So, the GLIBC error means that your libc version is too old. At this point I can see only three options:

  • Upgrade libc on your system
  • Rebuild tensorflow
  • Run tensorflow within a docker container
body_text:
So, the GLIBC error means that your libc version is too old. At this point I can see only three options:

Upgrade libc on your system
Rebuild tensorflow
Run tensorflow within a docker container
body:
So, the `GLIBC` error means that your libc version is too old. At this point I can see only three options:
* Upgrade libc on your system
* Rebuild tensorflow
* Run tensorflow within a docker container
